Meetings/20-09-2008

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Agenda

Major points

  • Portals
  • Trac

Attendees

(Those who said something)

  • CyaNox
  • needless
  • sueastside
  • rakhun

Decisions

Portals

  • Portals are a natural phenomenon, they cannot have any 'human' design influences in any way

Code

The names in brackets, at the end of the sentences, are the names of the staters of these sentences. Some are quoted, others aren't.

  • Trac system is not being used enough:
    • Because it's not being tested: bugs don't get reported (Sueastside)
    • If it does get tested (by a dev):
      • It's either fixed (Sueastside)
      • Not fixed: dev has not enough knowledge to do this (Sueastside)
      • It get's reported, but it won't get fixed: ticket too big, or not enough details on how to do it. (Sueastside)
  • Possible solutions to fix trac and to make it being used more:
    • Split the ticket if it's too big (Cyanox)
    • If there's a lack of details: change the ticket to reflect that (Cyanox)
    • Cyanox could add additional statusses to improve this
    • adding a link in the #peragro-dev topic as a reminder (Rakhun)
    • assign a person to do a follow-up, assign tickets to people (Sueastside) Note --> Rakhun has a friend who might be interested in doing this, but he needs to know who can do what in PT
    • can John report on Trac changes (New ticket, ticket reassign, ..)? (Sueastside)
    • release this version of the game so people can encounter bugs to be reported. (Sueastside)
    • Trac needs some clean-up. (Rakhun)
    • Cyanox will be working on Noxbot
  • What has been done:
    • Cyanox added a priority 'Split Up' so Larger tickets are marked to be split up. This currently has the highest priority.
    • Sueastside cleaned up Trac.
    • Sueastside split up some large trac tickets.

Settings

The rest

This meetings is the first one done like described in the mailinglist post: http://peragro.org/ml/?pid=53 suggested by CyaNox.
